issues.description: Potential nil pointer dereference: modAst.Go could be nil if the go.mod file doesn't contain a Go version directive, causing a panic when accessing modAst.Go.Version
Path handling inconsistency: Using path.Dir() instead of filepath.Dir() which could cause issues on Windows systems
Path handling inconsistency: Using path.Join() instead of filepath.Join() which could cause issues on Windows systems
Path handling inconsistency: Using path.Dir() instead of filepath.Dir() which could cause issues on Windows systems
Grammatical error in error message: 'did not found' should be 'did not find', indicating possible lack of testing
Potential infinite loop: retrieveModFile function could enter an infinite loop if there are symlinks in the directory structure creating cycles
